casebody.data:
Lonnie SWARTZ, Petitioner,
v.
Araceli RODRIGUEZ, Individually and as the Surviving Mother and Personal Representative of J. A. No. 18-309 Supreme Court of the United States. March 2, 2020

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of Hernandez v. Mesa , 589 U.S. ----, 140 S.Ct. 735, 206 L.Ed.2d 29 (2020).
